figure_2.title: Figure 2.
figure_2.caption: Critical findings: Defining features of abuse definitions.

claims.sentence: Duplicates were manually removed, and then 47,553 references were subjected to two rounds of title screening (as depicted in Figure 1).
These defining features have been used as a framework for comparison of the concept of “abuse” across the five categories of family violence (as displayed in Figure 2).
